name: Everest Embedded Bank File
summary: Learn about .EMB files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: EMB files are typically created and opened by Everest audio software. However, since Everest software has been discontinued, EMB files have become less common and the software has become more difficult to obtain.
Instead of using Everest software, you can use FMJ-Software Awave Studio to open EMB files. You can also edit the files and convert them to other audio formats. Awave Studio is available for Windows.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
